channel.title: trust on Robin Bate Boerop
channel.description: Recent content in trust on Robin Bate Boerop

item.title: Tip: Negotiate Achievable Goals
item.description: As the leader, it is your job to make sure that your software team’s goals are achievable.

item.title: Tip: Routinely Develop Your Influence
item.description:
If you are a software team leader, then you will need to make change on your team or within your company. That is by definition; leaders make change.

Social influence is what enables you to make change. Making time to develop this influence is crucial.

Methodically developing your social influence is much more effective than allowing your degree of social influence to develop “by accident”. Make it part of your routine.

item.title: On Trust
item.description:
Trust is a foundation for all relationships. It is therefore essential for business.

This is a primer on the concept of trust for software teams.
